entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Argument "3": Cannot convert from „Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.EventCallback<System.DateTime>” on „System.Action<System.DateTime>” #44955
  • Request features for request and response byte sizes #44953
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #44948
  • Invoking AddMvcCore 2x results in a "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: exists" #44945
  • HTTP Trailers Causing Response Truncation in FireFox when Served from IIS on Windows Server 2022 #44944
  • Potential out of memory with slow SignalR clients #44943
  • Long delay for request to start while debugging and another request is waiting #44940
  • Visual Studio Application Insights (Visual Studio only) feature not working at all #44938
  • [Blazor] We should support updating and removing statically rendered root components #44937
    .NET 8 Planning
  • PersistentComponentState: persist state outside OnPersisting callback #44936
  • PersistentComponentState: large state will crash the client, unable to recover #44935
  • Blazor WASM, Unhandled exception rendering component: ExpectedStartOfValueNotFound on login after published #44934
  • X-Requested-With header is incorrect in FetchHttpClient #44933
  • Make StaticFileOptions.OnPrepareResponse async #44932
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #44931
  • Blazor Hybrid Apps: Integrate API Controllers to fetch data offline via https://0.0.0.0/api/method calls from Javascript Frameworks #44929
    Backlog
  • No cleanup of rootcomponent #44928

Closed

  • [Blazor] new bind suffixes (after,get,set) fail to compile with .Net 7 #44952
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #44930
  • TypeScript type definitions (d.ts) not available for the "Blazor" object #44942
  • regular problems of MapFallbackToFile method for help #44881

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 2.1.39, merge internal commits #44951
    tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #44949
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #44947
    6.0.x
  • Remove workaround for crashing analyzer in globalconfig #44941
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump loader-utils from 2.0.0 to 2.0.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #44939
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Remove experimental and downlevel feeds #44879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44856
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • refactor(NavLink): render aria-current attribute #44913
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] Remove feeds, add to SiteExtension bundle #44882
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Remove experimental and dotnet5 feeds #44877
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [main] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #44868
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #44946
    3.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `a4f02ef` #44916
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `c824ca9` to `57bf5a0` #44915
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2039988 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Remove VS feeds #44876
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22556.1 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Change X-Requested-With header to "Fetch" in FetchHttpClient #44921
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/3.1] nit: Update `$(RepositoryUrl)` #44891
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44887
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime
